snippet: he Los Angeles Unified School District has voted to end the practice of suspending students who are defiant.
abstract: Los Angeles Unified School District votes to end practice of suspending students who are defiant, citing concerns that policy has disproportionately affected minority students, hindered academic achievement and lowered graduation rates.
lead_paragraph: he Los Angeles Unified School District has voted to end the practice of suspending students who are defiant.

headline.main: California: Suspensions End for Defiant Students
headline.print_headline: California: Suspensions End For Defiant Students
